[console_scripts]
idf-converter = idf_converter.cli:idf_converter_script

[idf.formatters]
anomaly_from_clim = idf_converter.lib.anomaly:anomaly_from_clim
compute_roughness = idf_converter.lib.sar:compute_roughness
compute_swot_roughness = idf_converter.lib.swot:compute_swot_roughness
compute_swot_ssha_unedited_nolr = idf_converter.lib.swot:compute_swot_ssha_unedited_nolr
contrast_from_pct = idf_converter.lib.scale:contrast_from_pct
dir2vectors = idf_converter.lib.vectors:from_dir
extrema_methods = idf_converter.lib.scale:extrema_methods
fill_1d_gaps = idf_converter.lib.interp:fill_1d_gaps
limit_extrema = idf_converter.lib.scale:limit_extrema
logscale = idf_converter.lib.scale:logscale
mask_methods = idf_converter.lib.mask:mask_methods
median_filter = idf_converter.lib.filter:median
n2_sst_from_slstr = idf_converter.lib.n2_sst:n2_sst_from_slstr
radial_velocity_sign = idf_converter.lib.doppler:radial_velocity_sign
remove_extra_lon_degrees = idf_converter.lib.geo:remove_extra_lon_degrees
remove_vars = idf_converter.lib.granule:remove_vars
s1_experimental_radial_velocity = idf_converter.lib.doppler:s1_radvel_exp
s3_cnes_rayleigh = idf_converter.lib.atmos_correction:s3_cnes_rayleigh
s3_nir_bc = idf_converter.lib.nir_bc:brightness_contrast
share_extrema = idf_converter.lib.scale:share_extrema
share_masks = idf_converter.lib.mask:share_masks
static_bands_mask = idf_converter.lib.mask:static_bands_mask
static_common_mask = idf_converter.lib.mask:static_common_mask
store_as_float32 = idf_converter.lib.data_type:as_float32
store_as_ubytes = idf_converter.lib.data_type:as_ubytes
stretch_extent = idf_converter.lib.scale:stretch_extent

[idf.input.readers]
bremen/amsr/L3/sic = idf_converter.readers.bremen_amsr_l3_sic
cmems/drifter = idf_converter.readers.cmems_drifter
ghrsst/l2p = idf_converter.readers.ghrsst_l2p
ibtracs/v4 = idf_converter.readers.ibtracs_v4
ifremer/scat/psi-backscatter = idf_converter.readers.ifremer_scat_psi_backscatter
iprc/argo_vi/monthly = idf_converter.readers.iprc_argo_vi_monthly
isas/monthly = idf_converter.readers.isas_monthly
jamstec/argo_oi/monthly = idf_converter.readers.jamstec_argo_oi_monthly
metoffice/en4/analysis = idf_converter.readers.metoffice_en4_analysis
metop/ascat/L2/wind = idf_converter.readers.metop_ascat_l2_wind
model/mfwam = idf_converter.readers.mfwam
model/topaz4 = idf_converter.readers.topaz4
netcdf/grid/latlon = idf_converter.readers.netcdf_grid_latlon
netcdf/grid/yx = idf_converter.readers.netcdf_grid_yx
noaa/cmorph/raw = idf_converter.readers.cmorph
osisaf/L3/sic = idf_converter.readers.osisaf_l3_sic
remss/L3/wind/bytemap = idf_converter.readers.remss_l3_wind_bytemap
remss/L3/wind/netcdf = idf_converter.readers.remss_l3_wind_netcdf
roemmich-gilson/monthly = idf_converter.readers.roemmich_gilson_monthly
rtofs = idf_converter.readers.rtofs
sentinel1/L1 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel1_l1
sentinel1/L2/owi = idf_converter.readers.sentinel1_l2_owi
sentinel1/L2/rvl = idf_converter.readers.sentinel1_l2_rvl
sentinel2/L1 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel2_l1c
sentinel3/olci/L1 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_olci_l1
sentinel3/olci/L2 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_olci_l2
sentinel3/slstr/L1/bt = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_slstr_l1_bt
sentinel3/slstr/L1/rad = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_slstr_l1_rad
sentinel3/slstr/L2 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_slstr_l2
sentinel3/sral/L2 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel3_sral_l2
sentinel6/p4/L2 = idf_converter.readers.sentinel6_p4_l2
smos/miras/L2 = idf_converter.readers.smos_miras_l2
swot/L2/windwave = idf_converter.readers.swot_l2_windwave
swot/L3 = idf_converter.readers.swot_l3
woa/monthly = idf_converter.readers.woa_monthly
